title: december 24: tracking santa
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about how a special Christmas tradition got started with a mistaken phone call. Then, revisits a fun release from one of our favorite KPOP bands. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
